patthana22.6:1.1: Nakusalaṁ noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana22.6:2.1: Nakusalaṁ nanoāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
patthana22.6:3.1: Nakusalaṁ nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana22.6:4.1: Nakusalaṁ naanāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā kusalo anāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
patthana22.6:5.1: Nakusalaṁ naāsavasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo āsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana22.6:6.1: Nakusalaṁ naāsavavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo āsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
patthana22.6:7.1: Nakusalaṁ naāsavañceva naanāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo āsavo ceva sāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana22.6:8.1: Nakusalaṁ naanāsavañceva nano ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
patthana22.6:9.1: Nakusalaṁ naāsavañceva naāsavavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo āsavo ceva āsavasampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana22.6:10.1: Nakusalaṁ naāsavavippayuttañceva nano ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca akusalo āsavasampayutto ceva no ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana22.6:11.1: Nakusalaṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato āsavavippayutto sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate pañca.
